name: Enlarge Fierce
description: Powerful Melee attack with a weapon.

name: Acrobatic Charge
description: Moves your character to the selected area, performs a Damage on targets in a straight line, and temporarily decreases their Movement Speed The Skill Effect increases when you are invisible.

name: Breaking Arms
description: Inflicts a Damage on a nearby target with a Dagger and temporarily decreases its Attack Speed. The Skill Effect increases when the target is affected by Acrobatic Charge.

name: Close Skirmish
description: Inflicts Fire Damage to a nearby target and temporarily increases its Skill Cast Time. The Skill Effect increases when the target is affected by Breaking Arms.

name: Precise Assault
description: Perform a Water Damage on a target in a medium range with a one-handed weapon and temporarily decrease its Movement Speed. Chance of stunning target when you are invisible.

name: Blue Dire
description: Performs a Damage on nearby targets within a certain radius with a Dagger and temporarily increases their Skill Cast Time. The Skill Effect increases when you are invisible.

name: Recite of Breeze
description: Performs a Damage on targets in a straight line with a one-handed weapon and temporarily inflicts continuous damage on them. The skill effect increases when the targets are affected by Precise Assault.

name: Insightful X
description: Inflicts a Damage on nearby targets within a certain radius with a Dagger and temporarily decreases their Skill Block Rate. The Skill Effect increases when the target is affected by Blue Dire.

name: Explosion Image
description: Inflicts Air Damage to medium-range targets within a certain radius and temporarily decreases their Dodge Rate. The Skill Effect increases when you are invisible.

name: Water Dream
description: Inflicts Water Damage to a nearby target and temporarily decreases its Damage. The Skill Effect increases when the target is affected by Insightful X.

name: Wounding Critical
description: Inflicts Earth Damage to nearby targets within a certain radius and temporarily does continuous damage over time. The Skill Effect increases when you are invisible.

name: Barrage Strike
description: Inflicts a powerful Damage on nearby targets within a certain radius. The Skill Effect increases when the target is affected by Wounding Critical.
